text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob..
Why have you written your name Bob?
Because we have a fun lesson to learn today! And it's about all of us!

My name is Bob... and Bob is a noun. 
I am a train... and trains are a noun

What’s a noun... I’m sure you will ask 
Let me show you… it won’t be a task
A noun..a noun.. something special they bring  To name a person... a place, or a thing

Let me point some nouns to you 
It’s gonna be a fun activity to do
New York my friends… with its tall towers
Holland oh Holland… with its pretty flowers Park Avenue a place… with very little sound These are places... and they are noun
A crazy top…that spins all around A lovely doll… that wears a crown

A golden bell… that makes a sound
These are all things... and they are nouns.

Jill and Jack… who just love to eat
Polly and Mary… who both look so neat
And little Johnny… who helps us when we’re down You are all people… and therefore nouns
A noun..a noun.. something special they bring  To name a person... a place, or a thing
A noun..a noun.. something special they bring To name a person... a place, or a thing

Come on now... let's play a little game
I spot a word... and you tell me it's name

Is it a noun... you shall have to tell
Don't you worry... you won't have to spell
Ok Bob. We're ready.
The see-saw
A noun
The yellow canary
Ummm... a noun?
Correct!
The guard?
A noun!
Grass?
Noun!

Big and deep... the Arabian Sea
Colourful and free... this beautiful bee

Nouns nouns nouns... they are all around
There isn't a place... where they can't be found
A noun..a noun.. something special they bring To name a person... a place, or a thing
A noun..a noun.. something special they bring To name a person... a place, or a thing
Yaaaaay!
Hope you enjoy today's lesson kids. We have more to learn and so much more fun left to have.
So, until we meet again, goodbye!
